title: Terlin Construction
author: ''
date: '2022-08-30'
slug: terlin_construction
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $631.3K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Terlin Construction. The average
  contract duration was 1.74 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $1.2M. The longest
  contract was 6.47 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $2.9M.
lookup_name: 'TERLIN CONSTRUCTION'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '631.3K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '6'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '3'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '50%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '28%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '5'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '1.6M'
s424_mean_duration: '1.74'
s421_mean_contract_value: '1.2M'
s425_max_duration: '6.47'
s422_max_contract_value: '2.9M'
---
